---
version: 2
created: 2025-08-17
tool: vercel
permission_mode: default
allowed_tools: [Bash]
model: sonnet
max_turns: 15
complexity: medium
expected_turns: 6-10
description: "Manage Vercel projects (create, list, configure)"
---
Use Vercel CLI to manage your projects.

Tasks:
1. List all projects using `vercel projects ls`
2. Explore project management options with `vercel projects --help`
3. Check current project details and configuration
4. Understand how to create new projects or modify existing ones
5. Examine project settings and metadata

Success criteria:
- Must successfully list existing projects
- Should explore project management capabilities
- Report project details, settings, and configuration options
- Document project creation and modification processes
- Show project metadata like domains, environment variables, team access

Note: This tests project-level management features for organizing deployments and configurations.
